Class GenericWorkbook

com.dua3.meja.model.generic.GenericWorkbook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Workbook, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Sheet>
public final class GenericWorkbook extends AbstractWorkbook<GenericSheet,GenericRow,GenericCell>

    • write

      public void write(com.dua3.utility.io.FileType<?> fileType, OutputStream out, com.dua3.utility.options.Arguments options, DoubleConsumer updateProgress) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: Workbook
      Writes the workbook to a stream.
      Parameters:
      fileType - the file type to use
      out - output stream to write to
      options - special options to use (supported options depend on the file type)
      updateProgress - callback for progress updates; parameter is between 0.0 and 1.0 or Double.MAX_VALUE for indeterminate
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
